definition: in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis

sentences.english: Recently, also identified specific procedures and the purchase of "three table" vetting .
sentences.chinese: 近日，又確定了具體的購買程序和“三表”審覈辦法。

sentences.english: The current vegetable price slump has taken its toll on Chinese farmers.
sentences.chinese: 近日蔬菜價格暴跌使廣大的中國菜農損失慘重。

sentences.english: It is reported that the temperature will decline sharply in one or two days.
sentences.chinese: 據報告近日氣溫將明顯下降。

sentences.english: The anomalistic year is the time between successive transits of the Earth through the perihelion.
sentences.chinese: 近點年是地球連續兩次通過近日點之間的時間。

sentences.english: Rafael Benitez has today been boosted by the return to fitness of defender Daniel Agger.
sentences.chinese: 貝尼特斯今天表示，阿格將在近日正式復出。

sentences.english: Raw materials, the Ministry of Industry, Deputy Secretary Song was recently revealed long beads.
sentences.chinese: 工信部原材料司副司長宋顯珠近日透露。

sentences.english: We shall have the pleasure of welcoming your visiting soon.
sentences.chinese: 倘於近日能歡迎您來訪，我們將感到快樂。

sentences.english: China to launch fifth orbiter for its own 'GPS' .
sentences.chinese: 我國近日將擇機發射第五顆北斗導航衛星。

sentences.english: It is a pity because recently rumours that female the ghost begging meters of water, avoid gossip mirror hung the boss.
sentences.chinese: 可惜因爲近日盛傳女鬼乞米水，老闆掛着八卦鏡防避。

sentences.english: I have just received your letter telling me your recent marriage.
sentences.chinese: 頃接來函，承你告我近日結婚。

sentences.english: Scientists discovered recently that men could live longer if they did more chores.
sentences.chinese: 科學家近日發現，愛做家務活的男性壽命更長。

sentences.english: Recently, Wu, chairman of the hotel, the more-accepted an exclusive interview with our reporter.
sentences.chinese: 近日，該酒店董事長吳愈勇接受了本報記者的專訪。

sentences.english: The recruiting result of UNNC Art Troupe Performance Team, 2011 will be published recently. Please check on time.
sentences.chinese: 藝術團表演隊伍招新結果會在近日公佈，請及時查收。

sentences.english: Recently, websites such as sohu.com, set up special sections for people to "divulge their salaries".
sentences.chinese: 近日，搜狐等網站設立了一些所謂的“曬工資”專區。

sentences.english: This reporter recently received information from the City Planning Board.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者近日從市規劃局獲得的信息。

sentences.english: Heavy rains have fallen on Ankang Permanent Way Depot for 7 straight days.
sentences.chinese: 近日，安康工務段管內連續出現7天強降雨。

definition: the other day/a few days ago
near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
late last year/the end of last year
not alone but in pairs (idiom, usually derog.); not a unique occurrence/it's not the only case
to learn of sth/to find out/to get news
to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]
(of video clips, rumors etc) to circulate on the Internet
